title: Carpark Resurfacing
description: Carpark of a local business resurfaced using an exacavator to dig up the uneven ground, and a steamroller to even it out.

title: Shepherds Hut
description: Handmade-produced shepherds hut for a Glamping company - as per the requested specs of the client - using the best sourced materials

title: Tree Removal
description: We used a mobile eleveated work platform to prune the upper branches, before using a chainsaw to fell multiple trees from a property.

title: Hedge Trimming
description: Using a mounted industrial hedge trimmer, we were able to give the hedges of a local squash club the tidy up they needed.
